from [dbo].[watermark]

select dateadd(day, -3, watermark_datetime) as watermark_datetime 
from [dbo].[watermark] 
where owner_name = '@{variables('adf_owner_name')}'
and table_name = '@{variables('table_ra_customer_trx_lines_all')}'
